amendment.description: Amendment to increase and decrease funding by $5,000,000 to prioritize the Land and Water Conservation Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 168 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to increase and decrease funding by $5,000,000 to prioritize the Land and Water Conservation Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A065) Agreed to by recorded vote: 325 - 107 (Roll no. 392).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A065) Agreed to by recorded vote: 325 - 107 (Roll no. 392).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
